video.title: Diggers
video.synopsis: With metal detectors in hand, a software writer and a copper miner travel around the Unites States hunting for rings, coins and historical treasures.

episodes.synopsis: In Georgia, the guys trace Union General William Tecumseh Sherman's historic "March to the Sea" and find an artifact that has eluded them for years.
episodes.title: Sherman's March

episodes.synopsis: In Colorado, the guys hunt for the secret location of a time capsule containing a mouse from the seminal Lisa computer designed by tech wizard Jobs.
episodes.title: Steve Jobs Time Capsule

episodes.synopsis: KG and Ringy search for two Revolutionary War forts in Pennsylvania, where they investigate to see if there may be truth behind an age-old legend.
episodes.title: Fortress of Roundness

episodes.synopsis: In Rhode Island, the guys dig up the playgrounds of the rich and famous and make an incredible historic find that is a first in the United States.
episodes.title: Mystery Coin

episodes.synopsis: KG and Ringy scour the Black Hills of South Dakota for gold, in a lost payroll chest belonging to a famous general from the American Indian Wars.
episodes.title: Custer's Payroll Chest

episodes.synopsis: The guys set out for an Indiana Air Force base on a mission to track down remnants from the crash of a downed Nazi fighter plane that disappeared.
episodes.title: Lost Nazi Plane

episodes.synopsis: In Maine, the guys search for artifacts linked to traitor Benedict Arnold. Then they help archaeologists find items before Fort Richmond is paved.
episodes.title: Chasing Benedict Arnold

episodes.synopsis: At Maine's Fort McKinley, KG and Ringy trace a military parade route to find lost buttons, buried weapons, ammunition and a legendary cannon ring.
episodes.title: Ammo in the Hole

episodes.synopsis: A search for evidence left by John Wilkes Booth puts KG and Ringy on a path toward finding missing pages of the notorious assassin's diary.
episodes.title: Lincoln's Assassin

episodes.synopsis: The guys comb the hills of South Dakota for hidden gold, then head for Dodge City to explore the town that gave rise to many legends of the Wild West.
episodes.title: Wild Bill and Calamity Jane

episodes.synopsis: KG and Ringy explore the town that was once the home of Wild West dueling sites, brothels and saloons frequented by Wyatt Earp and Bat Masterson.
episodes.title: Wyatt Earp Wild West

episodes.synopsis: When the duo gains exclusive access to one of the nation's most heavily armed forts, they try to recover a naval treasure lost during the Civil War.
episodes.title: The Lost Fortress

episodes.synopsis: The mayor of Vicksburg invites the guys to trace the route of Ulysses S. Grant and look for remnants from one of the Civil War's bloodiest battles.
episodes.title: Grant Takes Vicksburg

episodes.synopsis: In and around Chicago, the guys explore the lairs of infamous mobsters, like Al Capone's hit man, and search for a slot machine buried by Bugs Moran.
episodes.title: Gangland

episodes.synopsis: When the guys hunt for Blackbeard's treasure along North Carolina's Tar River, Ringy gets to cross off an item that has been on his wish list forever.
episodes.title: Blackbeard's Treasure

episodes.synopsis: The guys go West and try to strike it rich, searching mines dating back to the California Gold Rush that once produced a bonanza of precious ore.
episodes.title: Gold Rush

episodes.synopsis: KG and Ringy try to locate two historic army encampments from the French and Indian War, as well as a lost treasure of army payroll gold.
episodes.title: George Washington's Lost Camp

episodes.synopsis: In San Francisco, the guys dig below the city for relics from one of the worst quakes in America's history.
episodes.title: San Francisco Earthquake

episodes.synopsis: The guys visit the Bluegrass State in search of relics from two fabled distilleries and hunt for Prohibition Era liquor that may be worth a fortune.
episodes.title: Kentucky Bourbon

episodes.synopsis: The duo tries to prove that beneath a modern golf course lies the site where America's Buffalo Soldiers fought against a famed Mexican revolutionary.
episodes.title: Pancho Villa Nectar
